document.full_text: ratko mladic, the former serbian general accused of genocide in the balkan conflict, on friday made his first appearance before a u.n. tribunal to face charges of war crimes.
document.title: mladic refuses to enter plea at war crimes tribunal
lines_and_colors: ratko mladic, the former serbian general accused of genocide in the balkan conflict, on friday made his first appearance before a u.n. tribunal to face charges of war crimes.
